page.title: 05TRADE, CWMBRAN
page.content: J. Sainsbury's is a very large food store in Cwmbran which opened in 1976. It has a built in car park and this attracts trade to Cwmbran.182 people work in Sainsburys and approx.15,800 people shop there each week.They take approx.Â£11,500,000 each year at an average of Â£14 per person.At the front of the shop is a large area of fruit and veg,also a warehouse where deliveries of fresh food arrive each day.Sainsburys has its own bakery where they sell cakes and bread.Also on sale are ready packed bread and cakes together with a large variety of food such as dairy produce,tinned foods,frozen foods,and wines and spirits.All are displayed carefully and labelled where possible.Sainsburys is one of Cwmbran's most popular stores.
